mapper.select: SELECT e.name AS name, e.id AS email, m.lockerCode AS lockerCode, m.lockerID AS lockerID FROM member e JOIN (SELECT ld.* FROM lockerDetail ld INNER JOIN (SELECT lockerID, MAX(historyNO) AS MaxHistoryNO FROM lockerDetail GROUP BY lockerID) recentRow ON ld.lockerID = recentRow.lockerID AND ld.historyNO = recentRow.MaxHistoryNO WHERE DATEDIFF(ld.endDate, CURDATE()) = 3) m ON e.ID = m.mebrID;

SELECT * FROM lockerDetail WHERE lockerID IN ( SELECT lockerID FROM lockerDetail WHERE historyNO = ( SELECT MAX(historyNO) FROM lockerDetail GROUP BY lockerID ) ) AND DATEDIFF(endDate, CURDATE()) = -1 AND statusCode = 1;

SELECT ld.lockerCode AS lockerCode, ld.lockerID AS lockerID, CAST(ld.lockerNO AS CHAR) AS lockerNo, (SELECT m.name FROM member m WHERE m.id = ld.mebrID) AS name, ld.mebrID AS mebrID, DATE_FORMAT(ld.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS endDateString, CAST(DATEDIFF(ld.endDate, CURDATE()) AS CHAR) AS remainDays FROM lockerDetail ld INNER JOIN (SELECT lockerID, MAX(historyNO) AS MaxHistoryNO FROM lockerDetail GROUP BY lockerID) groupedld ON ld.lockerID = groupedld.lockerID AND ld.historyNO = groupedld.MaxHistoryNO;
